title: Asian Stocks Set to Gain Before US Data, Oil Rises: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities were set for a modest rebound after their first two-day slide of the year, with investors bracing for Friday’s US payrolls report and a possible Supreme Court ruling on President Donald Trump’s tariffs. Oil rallied.
content: Asian equities were set for a modest rebound after their first two-day slide of the year, with investors bracing for Friday’s US payrolls report and a possible Supreme Court ruling on President Donald Trump’s tariffs. Oil rallied.
